Cooley:
Looking up to WinLord with his Biological eyes, "Are you my Angel?" after those words his eyelids shut and winlord feels his body going limp.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord:

"Ok" said Windlord "I'll come back soon in case that you don't come 
back to base..."

He flew towards the Maxiaml Base

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> SureStike:
> Responds on the Come link. "We are under Fire right now but we 
found the two missing, Was it a clone of one of us that got him? We 
are fighting Clones right now. The Relay is setup so send a message 
back to base about what is going on. We will be catching up to you 
shortley." as SureStrike and the others begin to fall back with the 
injured taking heavy blow as the move.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> 
> Windlord opened his comlink to Sure Strike and said "SureTRike, 
> COOLEY IS WOUNDED i HAVE TO TAKE HIM TO BASE BEFORE HIS SPARK 
> GONE...!!"
> 
> After that he took him in arms and flew towards Maximal Base
>

a

> however don't look Robotic though they look almost Human.
